title: Full Stack Developer - Laravel React
description:
About the job
On site in Alexandria Salary starts from 15K.
Faculty of Engineering or Computer Science ONLY.
Must be graduated with defined military status.

Company Description
Sonamak is a leading software company in the middle east specializing in Hi-tech white label software solutions. Our flagship product, Sonamak App, is a market-leading Medical Institutions Management App.

Job Description
We are looking for a highly skilled Laravel / React Developer who is comfortable with both front and back end programming.
Full Stack Developers are responsible for developing and designing front end web architecture, ensuring the responsiveness of applications and working alongside graphic designers for web design features, among other duties.
Full Stack Developers will be required to see out a project from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail.

Full Stack Developer Responsibilities:
Developing front end website architecture.
Designing user interactions on web pages.
Developing back end website applications.
Creating servers and databases for functionality.
Ensuring cross-platform optimization for mobile phones.
Ensuring responsiveness of applications.
Working alongside graphic designers for web design features.
Seeing through a project from conception to finished product.
Designing and developing APIs.
Meeting both technical and consumer needs.
Staying abreast of developments in web applications and programming languages.

Job Requirements
BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject
Object Oriented analysis and design using common design patterns.
Excellent in PHP - Laravel and React JS.
Completed Military Service
Live inside Alexandria

title: Senior Fullstack Engineer - React/Node.js
description:
About the job
Company Overview
Kemet Trading provides institutional-grade infrastructure for digital asset derivatives trading; optimizing access to liquidity, data, trade execution and post-trade workflows.
Kemet is backed by some of the biggest names in digital asset trading and VCs in addition to a host of some of the best angels in the industry.

Role Overview
Kemet is looking for a product-minded senior fullstack engineer with focus on frontend to help the team build our crypto-derivatives trading platform. You will work with software engineers, leadership, product managers, and other engineering team members to design and implement frontend components in React, backend Node.js API, as well as coach full stack engineering on frontend best practices. You must have a passion for designing and building complex performant frontends and writing production quality code.

Essential Job Functions
Work with product managers and UX designers to understand desired software features, customer interactions, and system usability requirements
Build complex web frontends with an emphasis on performance, scalability, security, and high-availability. including building React frontend components in TypeScript, and backend Node.js API.
Establish and continuously improve Kemet’s frontend coding standards for style, maintainability, and best practices for a high-scale web environment.
Writing unit and integration tests
Performing code reviews, design reviews, and writing documentation.
Containerize their code and deploy containers to Kemet’s production and non-production environments using CI/CD pipelines.

Minimum Qualifications
8 years of experience in frontend development.
Strong object oriented design and development skills in TypeScript or, JavaScript
Expert knowledge in front-end development and building Single Page Apps using React.js, and backend APIs using Node.js.
Expert knowledge in MongoDB and mongoose. 
Strong knowledge in frontend design and development best practices, and state of the art web and mobile technologies. Advocate for and coach full-stack engineers on these practices.
Experience working on an Agile team, writing clean code and utilizing pair programming, TDD, continuous integration and code reviews.
Unit testing experience is a must, TDD is a plus (Jest, Jasmin, etc.)

Nice to have
BS degree in Information Systems or Computer Science or a related technical discipline, or equivalent practical experience.
10+ years of experience in frontend development.
Experience working with building visualizations and dashboards using technologies similar to D3.js or Echarts.
Experience in CI/CD (Git, Gitlab, Jenkins, Containers), knowledge in other DevOps practices is desirable (IaC, Terraform, Cloud Formation).
Experience with AWS or other cloud service providers.
Experience designing and building large scale distributed Microservices architecture based on 12-factor app guidance. Cloud-native, Serverless architectures experience is highly desirable.
Experience using tools like Jira, GitLab.

Benefits
Competitive Compensation Package
Unlimited PTO: Unlimited vacation policy for strong, fully charged batteries.
Remote work and flexible hours

Location - Remote Egypt

title: Frontend Developer
description:
About the job
Job Title: Frontend Developer
Department: Engineering
Location: Remote
Reports To: CTO
Contract Details
This is a 3-month contract position, with the possibility of extension based on performance and project needs.

Summary
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Frontend Developer to join our team. As a Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing and user-friendly web applications. You will work closely with designers, product managers, and backend developers to implement intuitive user interfaces and ensure a seamless user experience.

Responsibilities
Develop and maintain responsive web applications using modern frontend technologies.
Convert Figma and PSD designs into interactive web pages, ensuring pixel-perfect implementation.
Translate UI/UX design wireframes into high-quality code.
Collaborate with backend developers to integrate APIs and ensure data consistency.
Optimize frontend performance for speed and scalability.
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
Stay up-to-date with the latest frontend trends and technologies.

Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent experience.
Demonstrated ability to convert Figma and PSD designs into interactive web pages.
Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Experience with frontend build tools.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and data fetching techniques.
Experience with version control systems.

Preferred Qualifications
Experience with state management libraries.
Experience with accessibility best practices.

Benefits
Opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects.
Collaborative and supportive team environment.
Flexible work arrangements.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
About the job
Are you a “Sr. Frontend Developer” Looking for a unique challenge? Unleash your protentional by joining one of the biggest companies in the Middle East.
 
Job Summary: 
Responsible for implementing visual and interactive elements that users engage with through their web browser when using a web application.

Job Duties:

Build reusable code and libraries
Design and construct robust, scalable, and high-performance frontend solutions with an emphasis on architectural integrity, ensuring efficient handling of data and optimal responsiveness
Verify the practical implementation and technical viability of UI/UX designs, ensuring alignment with development capabilities and constraints.
He should exemplify proficiency in implementing industry best practices to maintain superior code quality.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Ensure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end services
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Develop specifications and designs for complex applications or modify/maintain existing applications
Able to analyze and debug critical issues and help resolve them within the accepted turnaround time
understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around such issues


Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s Degree in computer science and/or engineering or equivalent.
3+ years’ experience in JavaScript Framework (React JS + Next JS) (Redux) .
Excellent Understanding of OOP Concepts, especially in JavaScript
CSS compiler knowledge (E.g., Sass, LESS)
Excellent Knowledge of JavaScript unit testing frameworks and a proven experience with TDD/TBD with one of its frameworks.
Excellent Knowledge of, HTML 5, CSS
Excellent Knowledge of JavaScript + type script. 


Excellent Knowledge of Front-end frameworks (bootstrap, tailwind, etc.)
Excellent English language (written, spoken, and understanding).

title: Senior Frontend Engineer (Web)
description:
About the job
We are building the next Zillow, AirBnb in the Middle East called propertysorted.com

Want to join this rocket-ship as an early employee?

The Property Sorted team 

Behind the very best companies like Google and Airbnb are teams of talented, highly driven people, and that’s exactly the kind of team you can expect to join at Property Sorted. If you love autonomy, are naturally curious, and want to have a genuine impact within a growing company, we think you’d fit right in.

Over the past months, the founding team have been busy building a web app used by everyone across Egypt to make better property decisions in seconds. Our app is loved by thousands of users and ready to scale to millions. Over the next 12 months, the focus is to have PropertySorted in everyone's pocket. That’s very difficult. This is where you come in - you'll help shape our apps and really leave your mark; making the real estate industry a better place for everyone.

Here’s what you can expect to be working on as a Senior React Developer at Property Sorted: 

Ship product at the speed of light
Working closely with our co-founders to build the best app for our customers
A heavy focus on customer-first
Getting involved in making decisions for the roadmap
Ensuring feature requests and bugs get actioned quickly

Who we're looking for: 

Sense of ownership and responsibility towards the company
Insane attention to details
Debugging and researching skills
You have production experience with Next.js and React (6 years or more)
Bonus: Proficiency in python

What you will get:

Attractive cash compensation + High Equity
Hybrid work
Learning and development at the speed of light
Build a product and see it affecting millions

If you’re excited by this role, we encourage you to apply.

Qualifications
Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Experience with agile development methodologies
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field

title: Front-end Developer (React)
description:
About the job
Company Description
AIMEDREV is a pioneering healthcare tech startup with a mission to redefine the healthcare experience for physicians through the transformative power of AI. We are dedicated to enhancing the capabilities of physicians and elevating patient care.

Role Description
This is a remote contract role for a Front-end Developer (React). The Front-end Developer will be responsible for day-to-day tasks associated with front-end development, including building and maintaining web applications using React, implementing responsive web design, and collaborating with the back-end development team.

Qualifications
Front-End Development and Responsive Web Design.
Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
2-3 years of experience with React and related libraries/frameworks
An eye for design and attention to detail.

What We Offer:
Task-based contracts: Flexibility to work on a per-task basis.
Flexibility of remote work.
Competitive compensation: Get paid per task completed.
Exciting project: Help us bring our innovative web app to mobile platforms.
Collaborative environment: Work with a passionate and dedicated team.
